class fastsso.fsapi.middleware.keycloak_middleware.KeycloakFastSSOMiddleware(app, server_url: str, client_id: str, realm_name: str, client_secret_key: str, custom_headers: dict | None = None, proxies: dict | None = None, timeout: int | None = None, unprotected_endpoints: List[str] | None = [], user_model: Type[BaseModel] | None = None, create_user: bool | None = False)[source]

Bases: BaseHTTPMiddleware

This is a middleware class for integrating Keycloak with FastAPI for Single-Sign-On (SSO) Authentication. Any incoming requests will be passed through this middleware to check for the necessary authentication details provided by Keycloak.

This class also offers optional functionalities related to User Model initialization and to user verification.

async dispatch(request, call_next)[source]

Async function that processes incoming HTTP request and if necessary verifies the user.

Args:

request (obj): The incoming HTTP request call_next (obj): The middleware to be launched after this one

Returns:

obj: Returns the response that was created by this middleware or in case of failed authentication, return respective HTTPException.

Raises:

HTTPException: If user verification failed.

set_request_state(request, token: str | None = None)[source]

Update the state of the given request with information extracted from the token.

Args:

request (obj): The incoming request.
